content: My name is Reyga Fitra Ramadhan, and I am 22 years old. People usually call me Rey or Dega. I was born in Bogor, West Java, Indonesia. I am a graduate from Universitas Negeri Jakarta, majoring in Electronics Engineering. I have a strong passion for coding, especially in the field of software development, both in frontend and backend. I am proficient in using JavaScript and Golang, as well as their respective ecosystems.

As a dedicated and enthusiastic programmer, I continuously seek opportunities to expand my knowledge and keep up with the latest trends in the tech industry. I believe in the power of collaboration and teamwork, and I always strive to contribute positively to any project I am involved in. In my free time, I enjoy exploring new technologies, participating in coding challenges, and contributing to open-source projects. I am passionate about continuous learning and growth, and I am excited about the endless possibilities that the world of coding offers.

I am open to new challenges and opportunities that will allow me to utilize my coding skills and contribute to building innovative and impactful projects. I am excited to be part of the ever-evolving tech community and to make a positive impact through my work.
